attributes.action: Increase the threshold from £285,000 to £750,000 for Inheritance Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The average homeowner in Britain falls into the trap of inheritance tax. It was not meant for the average homeowner. It was a "wealth tax".  if you look at the value of your home, add to that your savings, insurance policy values etc you will be surprised at how much that can add up to.  Remember you have already paid tax on your earnings.  The thought of the government snatching back what I have worked hard for all my life is appalling.  I am an average homeowner, but fall inside this trap.

rejection.details:
There are already petitions on this issue
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=inheritance+tax
Please consider signing an existing petition, rather than creating another.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
